metadata.description: A hierarchical inventory relationship in which the configuration of (parent) component is patched with the configuration of other (child) component. Eg: The configuration of the EnvoyFilter (parent) component is patched with the configuration as received from WASMFilter (child) component.

patch.description: In Argo CD, Repository can be referenced by Application resource to specify the location of the Git repository where the application manifests are stored.
Application can reference Repository to specify the location of the Git repository where the application manifests are stored.

In Argo CD, The AppProject CRD is the Kubernetes resource object representing a logical grouping of applications. It can be referenced by Application resource to specify the project where the application belongs.
Application can reference AppProject to specify the project it belongs to.
